# Material Scratch Forum Editor Buttons
[![Install Style](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Install%20Style-gray?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://easrng.github.io/material-scratch-forum-editor-buttons/style.user.css)

This userstyle modernizes the Scratch Forum's editor buttons, changing them from tiny 16x16 bitmaps to SVGs from Google's Material Icon set.
